actors.name: United States of America
actors.description: Global superpower with dominant military, economic, technological, and cultural influence. Leader in innovation, global finance, and international diplomacy.

actors.name: People's Republic of China
actors.description: World's largest population, second-largest economy, rising military power, and dominant manufacturing hub. Key player in global trade and technology.

actors.name: European Union
actors.description: Powerful economic bloc and regulatory influencer, world's largest trading entity, and significant diplomatic force shaping global standards.

actors.name: Apple Inc.
actors.description: Tech giant with unprecedented market value, driving global technological innovation and consumer behavior, with significant influence on digital economy.

actors.name: NATO
actors.description: Dominant military alliance ensuring Western security, shaping global military dynamics and international security policy.

actors.name: Microsoft Corporation
actors.description: Technology leader controlling crucial digital infrastructure, cloud computing, and enterprise software globally.

actors.name: Russian Federation
actors.description: Major military power with vast natural resources, significant geopolitical influence, and strategic importance in global affairs.

actors.name: World Bank Group
actors.description: Crucial international financial institution shaping global development policy and economic governance.

actors.name: Alphabet Inc.
actors.description: Parent company of Google, controlling global information flow, digital advertising, and advancing AI technology.

actors.name: United Nations
actors.description: Principal international organization for global governance, peace-keeping, and international cooperation.
